alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Lafayette; Nevada; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 8:10AM CDT until June 10 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... Union County in south central Arkansas... Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 809 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Highland Industrial Park to near Cullendale to 7 miles southwest of Poison Springs State Park to near Willisville to 6 miles southwest of Bodcaw, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Magnolia, Hope, Smackover, Stamps, Waldo, Norphlet, McNeil, Strong, Calion, Emerson, Buckner, Rosston, Louann, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, Smithland, Wesson and Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
